`day_of_origin`|
  • when schedops.LEG.day_of_origin < 30.03.2025 then;
    • when `schedops.LEG.FN_NUMBER` between “100” and “999” then “International”
    • when `schedops.LEG.FN_NUMBER` between “1100” and “1799” then “International”
    • when `schedops.LEG.FN_NUMBER` between “5000” and “5779” then “International”
    • when `schedops.LEG.FN_NUMBER` between “5800” and “6799” then “International”
    • when `schedops.LEG.FN_NUMBER` between “6800” and “8879” then “Domestic”
    • when `schedops.LEG.FN_NUMBER` between “9000” and “9999” then “Domestic”
    • else “Non-Commercial”

  • when `schedops.LEG.day_of_origin` >= 30.03.2025 then;
    • when schedops.LEG.FN_NUMBER between “100” and “999” then “International”
